verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> toward Jerusalem <WH3389>, and drop <WH5197> thy word toward the sanctuaries <WH4720>, and prophesy <WH5012> against the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>;

and say <WH559> to the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Behold <WH3318>, I am against thee, and will draw forth my sword <WH2719> out of its sheath <WH8593>, and will cut off <WH3772> from thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>.

Seeing <WH3282> then that I will cut off <WH3772> from thee the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked <WH7563>, therefore shall my sword <WH2719> go forth <WH3318> out of its sheath <WH8593> against all flesh <WH1320> from the south <WH5045> to the north <WH6828>:
and all flesh <WH1320> shall know <WH3045> that I <WH3068>, Jehovah, have drawn forth <WH3318> my sword <WH2719> out of its sheath <WH8593>; it shall not return any more <WH7725>.
Sigh <WH584> therefore <WH1121>, thou son of man <WH120>; with the breaking <WH7670> of thy loins <WH4975> and with bitterness <WH4814> shalt thou sigh <WH584> before their eyes <WH5869>.

And it shall be <WH559>, when they say unto thee <WH584>, Wherefore sighest thou <WH559>? that thou shalt say, Because of the tidings <WH8052>, for it cometh <WH935>; and every heart <WH3820> shall melt <WH4549>, and all hands <WH3027> shall be feeble <WH7503>, and every spirit <WH7307> shall faint <WH3543>, and all knees <WH1290> shall be weak <WH3212> as water <WH4325>: behold <WH935>, it cometh, and it shall be done <WH1961>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Say <WH559>, A sword <WH2719>, a sword <WH2719>, it is sharpened <WH2300>, and also furbished <WH4803>;

it is sharpened <WH2300> that it may make a <WH2874> slaughter <WH2873>; it is furbished <WH4178> that it may be as lightning <WH1300>: shall <WH176> we then make mirth <WH7797>? the rod <WH7626> of my son <WH1121>, it contemneth <WH3988> every tree <WH6086>.

And it is given <WH5414> to be furbished <WH4803>, that it may be handled <WH3709>: the sword <WH2719>, it is sharpened <WH2300>, yea <WH4178>, it is furbished, to give <WH5414> it into the hand <WH3027> of the slayer <WH2026>.

Cry <WH2199> and wail <WH3213>, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>; for it is upon my people <WH5971>, it is upon all the princes <WH5387> of Israel <WH3478>: they are delivered <WH4048> over to <WH413> the sword <WH2719> with my people <WH5971>; smite <WH5606> therefore upon thy thigh <WH3409>.
For there is a trial <WH974>; and what if even the rod <WH7626> that contemneth <WH3988> shall be no more <WH5002>? saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.

Thou therefore <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012>, and smite <WH5221> thy hands <WH3709> together <WH5221>; and let the sword <WH2719> be doubled <WH3717> the third <WH7992> time <WH2719>, the sword of the deadly wounded <WH2491>: it is the sword <WH2719> of the great <WH1419> one that is deadly wounded <WH2491>, which entereth into their chambers <WH2314>.

I have set <WH5414> the threatening <WH19> sword <WH2719> against all their gates <WH8179>, that their heart <WH3820> may melt <WH4127>, and their stumblings <WH4383> be multiplied <WH7235>: ah <WH253>! it is made <WH6213> as lightning <WH1300>, it is pointed <WH4593> for slaughter <WH2874>.
Gather thee together <WH258>, go to <WH7760> the right <WH3231>, set thyself in array <WH8041>, go to the left, whithersoever <WH575> thy face <WH6440> is set <WH3259>.
I will also smite <WH5221> my hands <WH3709> together <WH3709>, and I will cause my wrath <WH2534> to rest <WH5117>: I <WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken it <WH1696>.
The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me again <WH559>, saying,

Also <WH1121>, thou son of man <WH120>, appoint <WH7760> thee two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, that the sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> may come <WH935>; they twain <WH8147> shall come forth <WH3318> out of one <WH259> land <WH776>: and mark out <WH1254> a place <WH3027>, mark it out <WH1254> at the head <WH7218> of the way <WH1870> to the city <WH5892>.

Thou shalt appoint <WH7760> a way <WH1870> for the sword <WH2719> to come <WH935> to Rabbah <WH7237> of the children of Ammon <WH1121>, and to Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389> the fortified <WH1219>.

For the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> stood <WH5975> at the parting <WH517> of the way <WH1870>, at the head <WH7218> of the two <WH8147> ways <WH1870>, to use <WH7080> divination <WH7081>: he shook <WH7043> the arrows <WH2671> to and fro <WH7592>, he consulted the teraphim <WH8655>, he looked <WH7200> in the liver <WH3516>.

In his right hand <WH3225> was the divination <WH7081> for Jerusalem <WH3389>, to set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733>, to open <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> in the slaughter <WH7524>, to lift up <WH7311> the voice <WH6963> with shouting <WH8643>, to set <WH7760> battering rams <WH3733> against the gates <WH8179>, to cast <WH8210> up mounds <WH5550>, to build <WH1129> forts <WH1785>.

And it shall be unto them as a false <WH7723> divination <WH7080> in their sight <WH5869>, who have sworn <WH7650> oaths <WH7621> unto them <WH5771>; but he bringeth iniquity to remembrance <WH2142>, that they may be taken <WH8610>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: Because ye have made your iniquity <WH5771> to be remembered <WH2142>, in that your transgressions <WH6588> are uncovered <WH1540>, so that in all your doings <WH5949> your sins <WH2403> do appear <WH7200>; because that ye are come to remembrance <WH2142>, ye shall be taken <WH8610> with the hand <WH3709>.
And thou <WH2491>, O deadly wounded wicked <WH7563> one <WH5387>, the prince of Israel <WH3478>, whose day <WH3117> is come <WH935>, in the time <WH3117> of the iniquity <WH5771> of the end <WH7093>,

thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: Remove <WH5493> the mitre <WH4701>, and take off <WH7311> the crown <WH5850>; this shall be no more the same <WH2063>; exalt <WH1361> that which is low <WH8217>, and abase <WH8213> that which is high <WH1364>.
I will overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754>, overturn <WH5754> it <WH7760>: this also shall be no more <WH935>, until he come whose right <WH4941> it is <WH5414>; and I will give it him.

And thou <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> concerning the children of Ammon <WH1121>, and concerning their reproach <WH2781>; and say <WH559> thou <WH2719>, A sword, a sword <WH2719> is drawn <WH6605>, for the slaughter <WH2874> it is furbished <WH4803>, to cause it to devour <WH398>, that it may be as lightning <WH1300>;

while they see <WH2372> for thee false visions <WH7080>, while they divine lies <WH3577> unto thee <WH6677>, to lay thee upon the necks of the wicked <WH7563> that are deadly wounded <WH3117>, whose day is come <WH935> in the time <WH3117> of the iniquity <WH5771> of the end <WH7093>.
Cause it to return <WH7725> into its sheath <WH8593>. In the place <WH4725> where thou wast created <WH1254>, in the land <WH776> of thy birth <WH4351>, will I judge thee <WH8199>.

And I will pour out <WH8210> mine indignation <WH2195> upon thee <WH6315>; I will blow upon thee with the fire <WH784> of my wrath <WH5678>; and I will deliver <WH5414> thee into the hand <WH3027> of brutish <WH1197> men <WH582>, skilful <WH2796> to destroy <WH4889>.

Thou shalt be for fuel <WH402> to the fire <WH784>; thy blood <WH1818> shall be in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776>; thou shalt be no more remembered <WH2142>: for I <WH3068>, Jehovah, have spoken it <WH1696>.
